website_summaries.verdict: One of the best diaper bags with a good combination of premium build quality, great style, and plenty of organization.
pros: Comes with a unique design and pattern combination that stands out
Comes with 11 pockets and a changing mat
Made from top grade polyurethane leather and padded canvas leather
High-quality buttons snap shut, eliminating the usual snags that can occur with zippers
cons: Fabrics don't hide rips, spills, and other typical damage as well as darker surfaces

customer_reviews.title: Perfect. Happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Love how sturdy it feels, it has some weight to it even when empty. Also love the material, it's not plastic-like like other diaper bags. It's about the size of a regular diaper bag though, but that means it's pretty spacious. Colors are nice and vibrant, traveling changing pad is also a bit thick, and the shoulder strap is long enough to wear messenger style.
customer_reviews.author: Daniela Castaneda

customer_reviews.title: Great quality without the typical diaper bag look
customer_reviews.text: Great bag with plenty of pockets to organize all your stuff! one of the reasons I decided for this bag was that it includes a matching changing pad, which is a must have for every diaper bag. the design looks a lot like the typical tommy hilfiger design and colors (I usually don't like anything that looks like a "wannabe" popular brand) but I actually like it. and it's very nice quality!

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color!  Good quality!
customer_reviews.text: Its a beautiful well made bag. It has a pad that is an added plus. The colors are bright and is very fashionable. The material is of good quality. The exterior is a nice thick canvas. The interior has a durable, plastic like liner. I really like the bag, so much that I like it more as a purse than a diaper bag!!

product_meta.title: COCOCKA 10 Pocket Premium Designer Diaper Bag Perfect Gift for New Moms with Boys or Girls Baby’s Organiser Weekender Baby Bag Tote Style Nappy Bag Fashion Maternity Bag W/Changing Mat
product_meta.description: TRENDY: Step out in style and stand out from the crowd with this multipurpose weekend tote bag style diaper bag. We created this color scheme and design to be different from the many Diaper bags out there on sale because we recognise that each person is unique and so why should we carry the same bag? LOADS OF POCKETS AND SPACE: We realise that that while on the go with your baby Boy or Girl, you need space to keep your own stuff too. That’s why we designed a baby bag with 10 large secured pockets so you don’t need to carry any extra bag. Doting Mum’s baby bag measures 49 x37cm which makes it one of the biggest in its class TOP NOTCH QUALITY: The Material used is 12oz canvas and high grade PU leather, high quality hooks that holds the long adjustable strap ensuring that you get value for money and long years of use.ABSOLUTELY NOTHING TO LOSE: If for any reason, you do not like it we will give you your money back, no questions asked. So why not give it a try? **PLEASE NOTE TEDDY BEAR SHOWN IN PICTURE DOES NOT COME WITH THE BAG****
feature_bullets: MULTIPURPOSE: It’s not just a Diaper Bag, it’s a Tote Bag, Weekend Bag, everyday bag. Unlike other Diaper Bags you won’t feel out of place going around town with this beauty as it was carefully designed to suit any outfit with or without your baby around.

10 POCKET BAG + FREE CHANGING MAT – No kidding! In fact, it has 11 pockets if you count the large main compartment. 2 side pockets with draw string suitable for milk or water bottles, 2 large button down front pockets, 5 large inner pockets inside the main zipped compartment and 1 large zipper pocket at the back. This stylish toddler bag also, comes with a padded free changing mat

UNIQUE STYLE + COLOR: Whether you are going out with your Infant or by yourself stay trendy, Fashionable and stand out from the crowd. Our color scheme and design aim to make a difference from the normal colors used by most Nappy Bags on sale by other brands. combination for this Premium Bag to cater for both Boy and girl infant colour codes and to keep you trendy even as Tote Bag.

SUPREME QUALITY-Made from 12oz Canvas material and strengthened top grade PU leather, the Maternity bag is sturdy. The Changing Mat is also, made from 12oz padded canvas fabric. The D -rings and hooks are made from high quality metal that will not snap when attached to the adjustable shoulder strap.

ASSURANCE-This Fashion Tote Bag is made to very high standard of quality which is backed with a 12 months’ warranty. So, if for any reason, you do not like it -you get your money back no questions asked.
